statements: UPDATE BioinformaticsData SET sequence = 'ATCGTAGCTAGCTAGCTAG', organism = 'Human' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE BioinformaticsData SET gene_name = 'ABC' WHERE id = 2;
UPDATE BioinformaticsData SET organism = 'Mouse', gene_name = 'XYZ' WHERE id = 3;
UPDATE Genes SET name = 'Gene1' WHERE id = 1
UPDATE Proteins SET sequence = 'Protein Sequence 1' WHERE id = 1
UPDATE Proteins SET gene_id = 1 WHERE id = 1
UPDATE Gene SET name = 'New Gene Name' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE Mutation SET type = 'Missense' WHERE mutation_id = 1;
UPDATE Variant SET name = 'VariantName', effect = 'VariantEffect' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE genes SET organism='Human' WHERE gene_id=1;
UPDATE transcripts SET sequence='ATGCTAGTCAGT' WHERE transcript_id=1;
UPDATE mutations SET mutation_type='SNP', position=25, new_base='C' WHERE mutation_id=1;
UPDATE gene_info SET gene_name = 'Updated Gene Name' WHERE gene_id = 1;
UPDATE protein_info SET length = 500 WHERE protein_id = 1;
UPDATE mutation_info SET mutation_description = 'Updated Mutation Description' WHERE mutation_id = 1;
